item.title: Large amount of fly tip, 10th August
item.description:
I have just witnessed a male about 5.5/7, in shorts an white T-shirt from number the upstairs of number 11 Elmerâ€™s end Road fill up 3 wheel barrows an walk down the road an dump a large amount of stuff on the little green where the bill boards are opposite the Coop. Had it not been gone 2am in the morning i would have approached him.

item.title: Bin bags left by the bin by garage door on Chambers Street, 9th August
item.description:
Occurs periodically - every few days somebody leaves rubbish bags (not on/right before bin day, it happens on other days of the week) outside the garage door of Springview Heights (which is located on Chambers Street not on Bermondsey Wall West) by the public bin. This attracts foxes and rats which sometimes tear the bags apart and scatter rubbish all over the street. Today somebody left a rubbish bag with an alarm in it which beeped for several hours (leading to the filing of this report), but this issue has been ongoing for years. Unclear if this is done by someone who lives in Springview Heights or elsewhere

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Bermondsey Wall West, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: #48 dumping rubbish in #50, 9th August
item.description:
We consistently see #48 dumping large amounts of waste, including building waste into #50 garden. The owners had cleared after years of dumping, but #48 continue to put new bags and general rubbish in the front garden.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 52, Fenwick Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish put out just hours after saturday collection., 9th August
item.description:
Rubbish dumped EVERY day outside No. 13. Metal bread bin outside 19 and several bags of dog poo outside 17. This daily fly tipping problem is a real concern to the residents, is there a reason the Council are powerless to stop it? Please help. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Orsett Terrace, Bayswater, London
Report on FixMyStreet
